casebody.data:
ARTHUR BARLOW v. COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION (14455)

Lavery, Schaller and Hennessy, Js.

Argued December 12, 1995 decision released January 23, 1996 David B. Rozwaski, special public defender, for the appellant (petitioner). James A. Killen, assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were James E. Thomas, state’s attorney, and John Dropick, senior assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (respondent). PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
